abstract: Bank of America, biggest company in North Carolina, aligns itself against new statewide anti-discrimination law eliminating protections for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people; Republican Gov Pat McCrory faces criticism, economic sanction and lawsuit over policy.

headline.print_headline: Major Companies Press North Carolina on Law Curbing Protections From Bias
headline.main: Major Companies Press North Carolina on Law Curbing Protections From Bias

keywords.value: Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Gov. Pat McCrory accused critics of a “vicious nationwide smear campaign” regarding a law ending antidiscrimination protections for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pat McCrory accused critics of a “vicious nationwide smear campaign” regarding a law ending antidiscrimination protections for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people.
